ruling: - If this monster is Special Summoned by the effect of [[Ultimate Insect LV3]], but is then flipped face-down, or removed from play with [[Interdimensional Matter Transporter]] or [[Dimensionhole]], its effect is reset, so even if flipped face-up again, it will no longer decrease the ATK of the opponent's monsters.
- You can Special Summon [[Ultimate Insect LV5]] with the effect of [[Ultimate Insect LV3]] even if that [[Ultimate Insect LV3]] was not Special Summoned by the effect of [[Ultimate Insect LV1]].
